title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Mobile Microlearning for Online Teacher Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the five core components of online teacher professional development modules.
Learners can apply instructional design principles using 15-minute microlearning content in mobile environments.
Learners can apply three interaction strategies based on expository teaching methods to actual classroom scenarios
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
